thread.title: Premier faces a recall

author: news24.com
title: Premier faces a recall
text:
KwaZulu-Natal Premier Senzo Mchunu faces being recalled by the ANC in the province should the plan to unseat him as chairperson at the ruling party’s provincial conference in November succeed.
An extremely powerful lobby, led by the ANC Youth League (ANCYL) and driven by several of the ANC’s 11 KwaZulu-Natal regions, wants Mchunu out as chair and ­replaced by the current provincial secretary, Sihle Zikalala.
If they have their way, Mchunu will be replaced as premier by Willies Mchunu (no relation), the current deputy ­chairperson of the ANC in the province. He is also the public safety and transport MEC. In terms of the plan, he will act as premier until the next national and provincial election.
The provincial cabinet will then be reshuffled to introduce Zikalala to government as an MEC so that he will be a “more appropriate” premier candidate for the ANC in the province come 2019.
